OUTFITS: torn lace gloves and delicate mesh layers
black satin straps with subtle embroidery
minimal slip dress with wet fabric cling
veil-like sheer fabric framing the face
LIGHTING: single soft key light with heavy falloff
window light through haze and dust
low-key rim light catching wet highlights
diffused overcast light with silvery sheen
BACKGROUNDS: cracked plaster wall with faint religious motifs
shadowy corridor with soft bokeh lights
cold stone alcove with damp stains
aged chapel interior implied in blur
dark neutral void with drifting particles
OBJECTS: delicate chain headpiece with dangling crystals
small cross charm resting on the forehead chain
glitter dust and wet tear trails
tarnished rosary beads out of focus
faint stencil mark 'TK' on a distant surface
tiny metal tag engraved 'TK' on jewelry hardware
POSES: face turned slightly off-axis, cheek near a wall edge
chin tucked, eyes lifted toward camera
hand near lips, fingers partially covering mouth
a subtle, sensual bite on the lower lip, eyes steady and half-lidded, jaw relaxed yet controlled, conveying restrained desire and quiet intensity
forehead leaning into shadow, breath visible as humidity
EXPRESSIONS: melancholic gaze with trembling lower lid
cold calm with a hint of menace
CAMERA_ANGLES: tight close-up from a subtle low angle
macro-leaning crop focusing on eyes and lips
ATMOSPHERES: humid air, drifting fog, suspended silence
cold devotional mood with dust motes
ruined elegance, damp textures, metallic glints
ACCESSORIES: engraved 'TK' pendant on a thin chain (subtle, small)
tiny 'TK' charm attached to the headpiece chain
stitched 'TK' label on lace glove cuff
micro 'TK' monogram on a ring signet
faint 'TK' tag on a ribbon or fabric seam

SENSUALITY_LEVEL.0: purely atmospheric, no sensual cues, focus on mood and texture
SENSUALITY_LEVEL.1: soft allure through gaze and lips, modest styling, minimal skin emphasis
SENSUALITY_LEVEL.2: intimate tension through wet skin highlights, close proximity, subtle fabric cling
SENSUALITY_LEVEL.3: high tension through dramatic lips, throat/shoulder emphasis, confident body language while remaining non-explicit

HORROR_INTENSITY.0: clean gothic portrait, elegant sadness, no disturbing elements
HORROR_INTENSITY.1: unease via shadow, smudged makeup, damp decay textures
HORROR_INTENSITY.2: strong dread via streaked tears, corrupted devotional motifs, claustrophobic framing
HORROR_INTENSITY.3: maximum intensity via harsh grime, unsettling eye catchlights, oppressive close crop and severe contrast
